"""
In the Buttons section, the document explains how to handle button events from input devices such as joysticks or gamepads in Panda3D. When a button is released, an event with the '-up' postfix can be used to catch this action. Additionally, if an unknown button code is pressed, the engine will generate an event named "[prefix]-none" to indicate that an unrecognized button has been activated.
"""

is the '-up' postfix which can be added to catch the event which will be thrown when a previously pressed button is released again. Note, if a button with an to the engine unknown code was pressed, an event like the following will be thrown. "[prefix]-none"
